channel.title: Modified D bow not working
channel.description: I want to make a D bow type thing for mods only on my server that doesn't use arrows and shoots 4 "arrows" at a time, each one equal to the stat bonuses of a rune arrow. I decided to take it a step at a time and make it with shooting 2 arrows at a time and shooting real arrows first but I can't seem to even do this. Even when I went and copied every normal D Bow code and put in my ID, 14493, it didn't work. I attacked my client.java. Tell me if you need anything else.

item.title: Modified D bow not working
item.dc:creator: @Asamin Asamin
item.description:
@Asamin wrote:

I have spent around 6 hours looking for solutions and trying new stuff myself. I am only here as a last resort.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2009, 03:42:04 pm[/size][hr]I am sorry about the double post but I know how the help forum works…

ontopic:
I tried setting everything in my client that was set at 4837 to 14493 and it worked as a normal d bow. But how do I get both to work??

Read full topic
